articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Kingdom: The Blood, game based on Netflix zombie series, gets a trailer
articles.description: Kingdom: The Blood is a new third-person action game based on a Netflix Korean zombie series called Kingdom. It’s first trailer teases intense and bloody action.
articles.content: Kingdom: The Blood stays true to its name

articles.title: Age of Empires 4 season 2 update brings new map, event, and other changes
articles.description: Age of Empires 4 season 2’s update launched on all platforms July 12. The new update brings much needed quality-of-life updates, a special event, and a new map.
articles.content: Season 2 of Age of Empires 4 is here. With this latest update, which launched Tuesday, comes a a special event, a new map, and a handful of new quality-of-life changes to help improve players overall… [+1600 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Citizen Sleeper’s first DLC chapter, Flux, launches at the end of July
articles.description: ‘Flux,’ the first of three free DLC chapters for indie RPG hit Citizen Sleeper, will launch for Nintendo Switch, PC, and Xbox on July 28. It’s free to anyone with the game.
articles.content:
Citizen Sleeper, the turn-based role-playing game that launched on Nintendo Switch, PC, and Xbox Game Pass in May, will get the first of three planned DLC episodes on July 28 at noon EDT. 
Titled Fl… [+1345 chars]

articles.title: Chainsaw Man returns today with Part 2
articles.description: After a two-year hiatus, Shonen Jump’s wildly popular manga Chainsaw Man is back, with new chapters resuming every Tuesday.
articles.content: Chainsaw Man, Tatsuki Fujimotos gory manga about a man named Denji who gains the power to turn into chainsaws (it makes sense I promise) has finally returned after a two-year hiatus. Chapter 98, the … [+729 chars]

articles.author: Russ Frushtick
articles.title: Fall Guys Pusheen cosmetics and costumes detailed
articles.description: Two new costumes are coming to Fall Guys, featuring Pusheen the cartoon cat and Pusheenicorn, a unicorn variant of the very same cat. The pair will drop into the game starting July 14.
articles.content: Fall Guys is no stranger to crossovers. From The Jungle Book to Cuphead, plenty of franchises have made the jump to Mediatonics gravity-centric multiplayer game. But the latest addition may be the cu… [+992 chars]

articles.title: Everything coming with League of Legends’ Star Guardians summer event
articles.description: Wild Rift, League of Legends, and Legends of Runeterra are all invited to the Star Guardian summer event. Here’s everything magical-girl-related coming to Riot’s library of games.

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: A24 horror movie Bodies Bodies Bodies gets a new trailer
articles.description: Lee Pace, Pete Davidson, Amandla Stenberg, and Maria Bakalova star in Bodies Bodies Bodies — a slasher flick about a hurricane party gone horribly wrong. Out Aug 12.
articles.content: A group of rich 20-somethings... and Lee Pace

articles.title: Kirby’s Dream Buffet announcement trailer is super cute
articles.description: A new Kirby game drops the pink puffball into a dessert world for some multiplayer racing fun. Available on Nintendo eShop sometime this summer.
articles.content: This is what dreams are made of

articles.title: Twitch streamer Myth moving to YouTube in exclusive deal
articles.description: Ali Kabbani, who goes by Myth online, is a former Fortnite pro leaving Twitch to stream exclusively on YouTube
